textBox.richText: Our wonderful Canadian adventures have drawn to a close. Today marked our last full day trekking through the Rockies, as tomorrow we start our journey back to the west coast of the United States! On our last day here we headed to Maligne Lake and Maligne Canyon. The lake and canyon are the largest of their type in the Rockies. I was a probably a little keen donning shorts this morning as it has started to get a bit chilly. Didn’t stop us from having an energetic day trekking around the tranquil lake and fighting off annoying tourists at the canyon. Snow is forecast for overnight - who knows what sights we’ll wake up to!
